product_name: Novara Zilker Woven Bike Shirt - Men's
long_description: Our Novara Zilker Woven bike shirt offers style and comfort both on and off the bike. Wear it for your casual urban adventures, from the grocery store to work to your favorite wind-down spot. The Zilker shirt keep you comfortable on the go with a nylon/polyester fabric that draws moisture away from your body and dries quickly. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective yarns are woven throughout shirt for increased visibility. Shirt also features an abundance of reflective hits to help boost your visibility to others: rollup sleeve features reflective trim; popped collar reveals reflective logo. 2 chest pockets, 2 discreet side zip pockets and an angled open back pocket store your necessities. Media port in chest pocket lets you conveniently route an earbud/mic cable for off-bike use. Button front. Active fit of our Novara Zilker Woven bike shirt is trim without inhibiting movement.
short_description: Our Novara Zilker Woven bike shirt offers style and comfort both on and off the bike. Wear it for your casual urban adventures, from the grocery store to work to your favorite wind-down spot.
